name: The Sovereign
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

  1. I Implemented a new mode, separate to the campaign, titled endless mode. The mode continuously spawns enemy units and the player tries to accumulate as many points as possible before being eliminated.
  2. I Added more information to the UI including current level/mode and a life counter.
  3. I Incorporated a separate score-keeper for each game mode. High score is saved separately between the campaign and endless.
  4. Bonus modification: I added a new mini-boss enemy (solar space station) and a boss enemy (pyramid space station) to both the campaign and endless.
